info.title: SubscriptionClient
info.description: Subscription client provides an interface to create and manage Azure subscriptions programmatically.

post.description: The operation to cancel a subscription

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2019-03-01-preview

default.description: Describes the error if the operation is not successful.

post.description: The operation to enable a subscription

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2019-03-01-preview

default.description: Describes the error if the operation is not successful.

post.description: The operation to rename a subscription

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2019-03-01-preview

default.description: Describes the error if the operation is not successful.

value.description: The ID of the canceled subscription

CanceledSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the canceled subscription

value.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being enabled

EnabledSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being enabled

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being renamed

RenamedSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being renamed

SubscriptionName.description: The new name of the subscription.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2019-03-01-preview
